Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) local w = PREFSMAN:GetPreference('DisplayWidth') local h = PREFSMAN:GetPreference('DisplayHeight') local aft = self:GetParent()(1) aft:SetWidth( w ) aft:SetHeight( h ) aft:EnableDepthBuffer( false ) aft:EnableAlphaBuffer( true ) aft:EnableFloat( false ) aft:EnablePreserveTexture( true ) aft:Create()
local aftsprite = self aftsprite:SetTextureFiltering(false) aftsprite:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/w) aftsprite:basezoomy(-SCREEN_HEIGHT/h) aftsprite:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+8) aftsprite:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y-15) local scale = 0.63 aftsprite:zoom(scale) aftsprite:GetShader():uniform1f( 'scale', scale ) aftsprite:SetTexture(aft:GetTexture()) end
